src:
Hasil Liga Inggris: Crystal Palace vs Leicester City 0-2
03 Nov 2019, 16:02 by Terjemahan, Aditya Budiman
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Crystal Palace harus mengakui keunggulan Leicester City saat tampil di Liga Inggris pekan ke-11, Minggu, 3 November 2019. Bermain di markas Palace, Stadion Selhurst Park, Leicester menang dua gol tanpa balas.
Dua gol tim tamu terjadi pada babal kedua. Gol pertama dikemas oleh Caglar Soyuncu pada menit ke-57. Lalu gol kedua sekaligus penutup datang dari aksi striker Leicester, Jamie Vardy.
Sepanjang pertandingan Leicester menguasai permainan dengan memegang kendali bola sebanyak 56 persen. Tim tamu melepaskan 14 tembakan ke arah gawang Palace. Sementara Palace membalasnya dengan 12 kali tembakan.
Hasil positif ini membuat Leicester tetap bertahan di papan atas Liga Inggris. Pasukan Brendan Rogers ini berada di peringkat ke-3 dengan 23 poin. Sementara Crystal Palace menempati peringkat 9 dengan 19 poin.
Posisi puncak klasemen Liga Inggris masih dipegang oleh Liverpool dengan 31 poin. Sedangkan peringkat kedua diisi oleh Manchester City yang mengoleksi 25 poin.

PREMIER LEAGUE
text:
Premier League Results: Crystal Palace vs Leicester City 0-2
03 Nov 2019, 16:02 by translations, Aditya Budiman
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Crystal Palace must recognize Leicester City's superiority when appearing in the Premier League in Week 11, Sunday, 3 November 2019. Playing at Palace headquarters, Selhurst Park Stadium, Leicester won two goals without reply.
The visitors' two goals occurred in the second half. The first goal was packed by Caglar Soyuncu in the 57th minute. Then the second and closing goal came from the action of Leicester striker Jamie Vardy.
Throughout the match Leicester controlled the game by holding the ball as much as 56 percent. The visitors fired 14 shots towards the Palace goal. While Palace responded with 12 shots.
This positive result makes Leicester remain in the top flight in the English League. This Brendan Rogers army is ranked 3rd with 23 points. While Crystal Palace is ranked 9th with 19 points.
The top position of the English league table is still held by Liverpool with 31 points. While the second rank is filled by Manchester City who collected 25 points.

PREMIER LEAGUE
